FAQ.question: What is the purpose of this project?
FAQ.answer: This project is a simple FAQ page that provides answers to common questions.

FAQ.question: How do I use this project?
FAQ.answer: You can use this project by running it on a local server and accessing it through your web browser.

FAQ.question: Where can I find more information?
FAQ.answer: You can find more information in the project's documentation or by contacting the project maintainers.
